backend/main.mo: Defines user, artist, artwork, submission, and inquiry types with maps for storage and includes access-controlled CRUD for profiles, submissions, and inquiries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes using an OKLCH-based palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, profile setup context, and admin route protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Renders an admin table of all purchase inquiries with loading state, empty state, artwork info, buyer details, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReplaceDat: Provides a destructive admin control that opens a confirmation dialog and triggers dataset replacement via a mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays all artwork submissions with status badges, image previews, and admin actions to approve or reject each submission.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Form for creating an artist profile with validation, submission handling, and success or error messaging.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form for editing artwork details including title, description, price, and optional image replacement with preview and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin permissions, showing appropriate redirects or alerts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles login and logout via Internet Identity with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal shown to new users for completing profile setup, including name, email, bio, and optional avatar upload.
Provides a React context for opening and closing the profile setup modal and a hook to access it.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Displays an artwork card with image, details, navigation to artwork page, and a lightbox for enlarging the image.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryF: Renders category and sorting dropdowns for filtering and ordering gallery artwork.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Reusable image component that validates URLs, handles load failures, and displays fallback UI while preserving layout.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Fullâ€‘screen lightbox dialog for viewing artwork images with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Dialog for submitting purchase inquiries, handling authentication, profile checks, form submission, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation links, login button, admin/profile options, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Displays a confirmation card after artwork submission with submission details and navigation options.
Form component for submitting artwork including image upload, draft saving, validation, and conditional artist profile creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Provides admin-side hooks to fetch submissions and inquiries and to approve or reject submissions with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Hooks for listing artists, fetching artist profiles, and creating new artist profiles with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Hooks to fetch all artworks or a specific artwork using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for user profile retrieval, saving profiles, and checking admin authorization with identity-based gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to delete an artwork and invalidate related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to edit artwork fields and refresh artwork and submission caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches submissions created by the logged-in user using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Mutation hook to create a purchase inquiry and refresh related query data.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplaceDataset.ts: Mutation hook to reset backend data and invalidate all major data queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to submit new artwork and refresh artwork and submissions caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders admin dashboard with dataset controls and tabs for submissions and inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays artist details and lists artworks filtered by artist ID.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists with website links and profile navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Shows artwork details with inquiry, delete, and lightbox actions and ownership checks.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Allows authenticated owners to edit artwork and handles permissions and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays artwork grid with filtering, sorting, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero section, features, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to edit details, upload/remove avatars, and save changes using auth and backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Artwork submission page that enforces authentication and profile completion, renders the submission form, and shows confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with validation for type and size.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting GBP amounts between decimal and minor units.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Determines user-friendly image load error messages and validates image URLs.
frontend/src/utils/optionalEmail.ts: Normalizes optional email fields for backend storage and form display.
frontend/src/utils/submitArtworkDraft.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing artwork submission drafts in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, listing existing and pending features about public gallery access, profile gating, and an artist-listing bug. Includes architectural notes, known issues, and version metadata.
